channel.title: Self Appointed Master Chef on Open Science Community Rotterdam

item.title: OSCR Member: Asimina Aslanidou
item.description: Description I am a PhD candidate in Experimental Psychopathology at the Department of Psychology, Education and Child Studies at Erasmus University Rotterdam. My research focuses on factors that influence how people generalize their fear across different objects/people/situations that they encounter in everyday life. I compare several psychophysiological and brain measures and the goal is to understand what makes fear generalization turn from a helpful trait to a maladaptive symptom.
